item.title: Grace VanderWaal - I Don't Like You - Key of Dm
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Key of Dm.
Chords Used: Dm, Bb, C, Am, A
As performed by Grace VanderWaal
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/un3nh0nx_sc
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at: https://ukutabs.com/g/grace-vanderwaal/i-dont-like-you-two/ **************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).
Want to make a donation towards this work? Visit https://www.paypal.me/ukestuff or https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ukestuff
Check out the "merch": https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Toby Turner & Tobuscus - I Can Swing My Sword! - Key of Dm
item.description:
I Can Swing My Sword! (Minecraft Song) by Toby Turner. It’s been lowered by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: Dm F A
To see the Tobuscus animation video click here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eN7dYDYfvVg .
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Survivor - 'Rocky" Eye Of The Tiger - Key of Dm
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Dm
Chords Used: Dm, C, A, Bb, F, Gm
As performed by Survivor.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/tbjfpz8at8A
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff

item.title: Glee Cast - Somebody That I Used To Know - Key of Dm
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Somebody That I Used To Know - Gotye (feat. Kimbra)
Using the chords: Bb C Dm
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or D XU D XU (X=chuck)
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Marshmello - One Thing Right - Key of Dm
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Dm.
Chords Used: Dm, Bb, F, C
As performed by Marshmello & Kane Brown
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/fKBayPdhryM

item.title: Time for a Tune Up (The Joy of Gone) Ukulele Play Along - Key of D, Dm

item.title: The Burglar Uke Chords - Key of Dm
item.description: Simple song that makes are a great guessing game and it's easy to play.

item.title: Melanie Martinez - Dear Porcupines - Key of Dm
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Dm. Raised a whole step from the original.
Chords Used: Dm, F, Bb, A7
As performed by Melanie Martinez.
CONTENT WARNING: Don't use this in a school setting. The song is all about bullying and how success makes the "porcupines" decide to be your friend...and the lyrics say the rest.
This was a request from Książkoholiczka...3 months ago. I am not planning on making a Baritone, Lyric, or Tutorial for this video, but if the views are substantial, I may consider adding those videos later.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Visit my non-play along ukulele channel: YouTube.com/UkeStuff
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Lenka - Everything at Once - Key of Dm
Sam Smith - Too Good At Goodbyes - Key of Dm
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Dm
Chords Used: Dm, F, C, Gm
As performed by Sam Smith
This video has been blocked by the copyright holder since it was published on December 1, 2017. The copyright holder is now allowing it to be used (thank you!) so it is available to you!
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
There is a master list of all similar play along videos at my blog: ukestuff.info. Access to the blog, and all materials on the blog is free.
Want to make a song suggestion? Follow the link and fill out the form! https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvgacvP7hB46DGeJ8o6Gsn7V8JAPsHFo7G-Q4TkiHsILBiAw/viewform?usp=sf_link
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. Patreon rewards include access to my “method” of the video play alongs (to be used in a classroom) as well as some other resources, and starting in 2019, a chord sheet of every song posted as a play along.
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel!
